body.name: Tyler Glam Wash Laundry Detergent, Diva, Liquid, 64 Fl Oz (Half Gallon) HE Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 15 hrs 59 mins
features: &#9989 ALL-NATURAL LAUNDRY DETERGENT – Hypoallergenic, deep cleansing liquid soap with lasting freshness
&#9989 GENTLE ON DELICATES & SPECIALTY FABRICS – Great for specialty fabrics, lingerie and delicate linens
&#9989 CLEANS & SOFTENS – Glamourous wash is powerful on dirt, stains, and softens fabrics leaving no residue
&#9989 HIGH EFFICIENCY LIQUID SOAP – No need to add fabric softener, made for energy saving appliances

&#9989 BIODEGRADABLE & CHEMICAL FREE – This concentrated, fine laundry detergent cleans dirt, lifts stains, and softens fabrics without the use of any artificial fillers, dyes or phosphates (shake well with each use) Use for hand wash or machine wash (HE or Standard Loads)

productInformation.value: #5,240 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #67 in Liquid Laundry Detergent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who needs perfume?
reviews.reviewText: A client came into where I work and they smelled absolutely amazing. I immediately asked what perfume they were wearing and they said none, it was their laundry soap. I immediately ordered Diva and mixed it with 2 parts unscented Tide to 1 part Diva. I honestly loved the smell but didn’t find it that strong. Because of the cost, I use it on bedding, blankets and towels only. The hubs comes home from work and immediately asks “What’s that smell?” For which I replied, laundry soap. He said it reminds him of his supervisor at work…. “Oh God, now I have to come home to be reminded of work.” I guess his boss uses Diva as well. It’s way too pricey, but cleans well. Clothing is soft and smells fantastic. It’s a super clean smell… the only way I can describe it. It’ll repeat purchase as needed. It, along with the Tushy, I think are my favorite purchases from Amazon. Life changing!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the indulgence
reviews.reviewText: We learned about this from a very good friend of ours, whose house always smells so good. She told us about this stuff, and subsequently ordered the same day. For us, this is not an everyday laundry detergent for everything. We use this only on our bedding and towels. The smell is amazing and lasts a very long time.I was concerned that, because the scent is so strong that this was full of chemicals, but according to the description this is "BIODEGRADABLE & CHEMICAL FREE...this concentrated, fine laundry detergent cleans dirt, lifts stains, and softens fabrics without the use of any artificial fillers, dyes or phosphates..."It is pricey, but definitely worth the spend to treat yourself to a bit of luxury.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have worn angel perfume since I was 16, and I am 43 and it is still my favorite. This diva detergent smells like a lighter scent of that perfume. I love washing all of mine and my daughters clothes in it. Along with towels and blankets, just because I LOVE this scent so much. I have people stop and ask me what the scent is almost daily. Yet it’s not so overpowering that it engulfed you. They walk by me closely or I’m talking to them closely and they can smell it. You don’t need very much, and how much you use obviously can determine the strength. I do add a Tide free and clear pod with this just because!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This detergent smells so luxurious. I mix it with cheaper, unscented laundry detergent and it is so strong that everything still comes out smelling amazing and it lasts for weeks. I would recommend diluting it because it is so concentrated and also expensive, but worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This stuff smells so good. It is pricey, but I’ve picked up some good tips from other reviews on how to make it last longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it so much, smells amazing! It is a little expensive tho ☹️ BUT STILL WORTH IT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST SMELL IN THE WORLD!!
reviews.reviewText: I stopped a lady in a shop to ask her what perfume she was wearing. It was the best thing I have ever smelled on anyone. She told me it was her detergent. At first, I thought that couldn't be right. However, she said I could buy it at the store I was in so I went over there and opened the top to smell it. WOW!! I was shocked at how expensive it was so I bought a small one. I went home and washed my blankets with this detergent. I was in heaven!!! I don't know how to explain the smell other than to say it smells so clean and perfect. The smell fades after the first couple of days but it is still there. I now wash my blankets and pillow cover and my shirts in it. I have reordered many many times. I have had lots of people stop me to comment on my perfume and they are always shocked when I tell them it is my detergent. Buy it you deserve it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This wash is amazing! It lingers for weeks and longer in drawers and closets. Just my personal opinion, this product works best in newer model washers. The older models use way too much water, and you lose much of the fragrance due to this. I have both kind, and that was my experience. The wash is light and it only takes the recommended amount (in newer machines) This wash is a bit pricy for the amount you get. It's a nice little splurge gift for yourself, definitely worth it ~
